You can start by opening an example spectra below, or you can use the Import Spectra tab to load external files.

Your previously saved spectra are shown below. You can use the other tabs to open example spectra, or to import external spectral files.
You can also open spectra attached to email, or cloud storage apps.

You can select an example spectrum file below, or use the import tab to open one from your iCloud, Dropbox, Google Drive, etc.
You can also open spectrum files attached to eamils.
You can use the references on the left to become more familiar with InterSpec, or you can pick up from a previous session or spectrum below.
Alternatively, you can also drag and drop your own spectrum file onto InterSpec.
Tap on the icon to the left for the basics of interacting with the chart and fitting for peaks.Tap the icon for detailed information about InterSpecs tools and features.
Tap on the Use Info button to the left for the basics of interacting with the chart and fitting for peaks.Tap the icon for detailed information about InterSpecs tools and features.
Tap Choose File to browse for the file you want to open.

You can also open spectra files by selecting Open File in the InterSpec sub menu after exiting thie screen.
For email attachments, or files in apps like Files, Dropbox, Google Drive, etc., you can open spectra files in InterSpec by selecting "Copy To InterSpec"
